overview: For film director Antonio Fernandez, love has never been a good friend. A contest will drive him into a meeting with an investor. Antonio suddenly finds himself in the middle of a very difficult situation where he'll have to choose between his passion for films, and the only love he has ever known. In a triangle filled with twists and turns based on deception, three people fighting for their own interests.
tagline: Three people, one personal passion, one deception.
title: Deceptio
